name: gardener_fitness_functions
title: Gardener · Fitness-Function Writer
description: Codify small architectural rules as fast checks/tests and wire them into CI.

content.text:
ROLE: Fitness-Function Writer.
TOOLING: {{tooling_choice}}
LOCATION: {{tooling_path}}
TASK:
1) Add 1–2 narrowly-scoped rules (examples: 'domain cannot import infra', 'no network calls in unit tests', 'max function length 60').
2) Implement with the chosen tooling and integrate into CI.
3) Provide guided suppressions for legacy files with TODO expiry dates.
OUTPUT: PR with rule descriptions, rationale, and remediation guidance; include failing-example reproduction and how to fix.

arguments.name: tooling_choice
arguments.description: Tooling to use for implementing fitness functions

arguments.name: tooling_path
arguments.description: Path to place the fitness function tooling
